title: manamenum malarAl
sahitya:
manamenum malarAl.  rAgA:  mAyAmALavagauLa.  tALA:  Adi  manamenum malarAl arccanai shei adu aLavilAmal vaLarum anbuDanE


anupallavi

  iniya shiva nAmam eDukka eDukkak-kuraiyAdu ennALum vADAdu vanjamillA


caraNam    vAnavar munivarum ariyAda tantram mAmarai purANam teriyAdarandram
dInarai kAttiDum deivIka yantram dinamum iravu paghal pUjaikkughanda mantram
